en-US.title: Collections
en-US.subtitle: Collections - Project Data Collections Relationships and Insights
en-US.description: Project Data Collections Relationships and Insights
en-US.introduction:
View Insights and get to know the relationships between the collections in the database.
Select one of the collections in the menu to load the diagram, relationships and insights!

how.headline: Fields and Relationships
how.description: Click on each collection to view the collection or click on each field for more information.
